Step.Line1: Generation of 3D Boolean model from .txt file.
Step.Line2: Text file is obtained from a previous Boolean model simulation plugin.

Step.Line1: Change the size of the generated volume :
Step.Line2: o Same as original : keep the initial size from .txt file.
Step.Line3: o New size : scale the generated cube to a new size.

Step.Line1: Define the new size of the generated volume
Enable expert mode to activate additional parameters.
Periodic volume along x-axis and y-axis.
Objects are labelled if parameter - labelling - is checked.
Activate preview to show the preview result.
